DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if the daily use of a certain amount and type of milk component for 2 months provides a significant stimulation to the immune system and specifically increases the chances of being protected against pneumonia after the vaccination.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Milk Components on the Response to the Pneumonia Vaccine in Senior Citizens
